history.title: Chat
history.emptySubtitle: Start a new chat to begin.

welcome.line1: Navi will help make your cancer-care journey a bit easier.
welcome.line2: Upload your recent test results for more accurate guidance.

analysis.inProgressLine1: This may take a few minutes. Please hold on.
analysis.inProgressLine2: Feel free to keep chatting while we work.
analysis.inProgressLine3: We will let you know when it is done.
